title: Sunset Hill Live Wallpaper - Pro v1.3.6 (Android)
description:
Same as in our Sun Rise app: each morning and each night, a flock of birds will fly out and form a greeting message, and you can touch to chase them away.

The scene has full parallax effect: when you swipe to change between home screens, the scene will scroll with parallax effect.


The Pro version has many extra features:

Sounds:
In the Pro version, you can turn on chirping sounds for birds and greeting birds.

Stars:
In the Pro version, you can catch a glimpse of the first night sparkling stars by enabling this feature in the settings.

Sky:
In the Pro version, you can adjust the color tone of the sky to suit your device and your taste. 
You can make the scene feel more warm, more cool, or tune up the vibrancy with intense sun.

Trees:
In the Pro version, the trees can be touched. You can touch to pull the branches, stir up the sparrows.

Greeting:
In the Pro version, you can set the greeting birds to show on both mornings and nights.
You can choose to have them stay on the screen for a while after being touched.
Or you can disable them if you don't like.

Parallax Effect:
You can adjust the speed and amount that the scene moves when you scroll between home screens.

Other Settings:
Animations can be reduced to save battery when battery is low and not charging.
There are various other settings for stars, leaves, bird, deer, etc.


This is the Sunset sequel to Sun Rise Live Wallpaper, which has been downloaded more than 10 million times.
Since this is still an early release of Sunset Hill, it can definitely be improved. Send us an email toif you have suggestions or bug report!

TO USE: Home -> Press Menu -> Select Wallpapers -> Select Live Wallpapers -> Select Sunset Hill (Pro) from the list.
